messages.content: A vintage architectural infographic of  that blends art and technical clarity: a detailed front elevation at the center, a clean line-art landscape of  behind it, and annotated dimension lines with sample values like “” and “”. Surrounded by 2–3 close-up detail boxes and a “Site plan – ” panel, the piece uses pen-and-ink hatching on warm aged paper to feel like a hand-drawn architectural study sheet.

usage_example.python:
from openai import OpenAI

client = OpenAI()

response = client.chat.completions.create(
    model="gpt-4o",
    max_tokens=4096,
    messages=[
        {"role": "system", "content": """A vintage architectural infographic of  that blends art and technical clarity: a detailed front elev..."""},
        {"role": "user", "content": "Your message here"}
    ]
)
print(response.choices[0].message.content)
